entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 9.
